title: Savoury courgette cake
ingredients: ['6 small courgettes', '8 to 10 courgette blossoms, internal stems removed', '1 red or white onion, finely chopped', '5 or 6 leaves fresh basil, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped parsley', '4 eggs', '200g plain flour', '150g cornmeal (or fine semolina)', '150ml water, or as needed', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'extra virgin olive oil, to taste']
